faq.title: Good to Know
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions.
started.title: üìò Getting Started
started.subtitle: Setup guidance, platform integration, and everything you need to begin with automated Bitcoin trading.

started.items.title: Is the system suitable for beginners?
started.items.description: Yes. Fully automated operation and intuitive design make it easy to start ‚Äî no prior experience required.

started.items.title: How do I access the strategy?
started.items.description: After subscribing, you can run and manage the strategy directly through your account ‚Äî quick and straightforward.

started.items.title: Which platforms are supported?
started.items.description: Our strategy currently supports **Bidget** ‚Äî integration is simple and secure.

performance.title: üìä Strategy & Performance
performance.subtitle: How the AI strategy operates, manages risk, and performs across different market conditions.

performance.items.title: Which markets and timeframes are supported?
performance.items.description: Our strategy is optimized for Bitcoin but can be applied to other volatile assets and timeframes above 4 hours.

performance.items.title: How does the system handle market volatility?
performance.items.description: The strategy adapts dynamically to changing market conditions, maintaining stability even during turbulent periods.

performance.items.title: Are all trades profitable?
performance.items.description: No. Losses are part of any trading strategy. The system focuses on managing downside risk while maintaining statistical edge over time.

performance.items.title: Can I customize the strategy?
performance.items.description: Yes. Key parameters such as risk profile and trading behavior can be adjusted to match your preferences.

performance.items.title: How do I interpret performance metrics?
performance.items.description: We provide clear dashboards and charts so you can track returns, drawdowns, and risk metrics at a glance.

security.title: üîê Security & Control
security.subtitle: How your capital remains fully under your control while using automated execution.

security.items.title: Is my capital safe?
security.items.description: Yes. The system does not access your wallet or funds. You retain full control over your investments at all times.

security.items.title: How secure are API keys?
security.items.description: Your API keys are never shared or stored outside your own account. The strategy operates securely via read/write permissions only.

security.items.title: Can I stop the strategy anytime?
security.items.description: Yes. You can pause or stop the strategy immediately via your dashboard at any time.

billing.title: üí≥ Pricing & Billing
billing.subtitle: Transparent subscription plans, trial access, and flexible cancellation options.

billing.items.title: How is billing handled?
billing.items.description: Payments are securely processed via Stripe. Billing occurs automatically based on your selected subscription cycle (monthly, quarterly, or annually).

billing.items.title: Can I cancel at any time?
billing.items.description: Yes. You can cancel your subscription at any time through the billing portal. Access remains active until the end of the current billing period.

billing.items.title: Are there any hidden fees or performance charges?
billing.items.description: No. There are no hidden fees, profit-sharing models, or performance-based commissions. The subscription price is fixed and fully transparent.

billing.items.title: Does the subscription include future updates?
billing.items.description: Yes. Active subscriptions include continuous framework improvements, optimizations, and feature updates at no additional cost.

billing.items.title: What happens after purchase?
billing.items.description: After successful payment, you receive immediate access instructions along with step-by-step integration guidance to set up the system.

billing.items.title: Is there a minimum contract duration?
billing.items.description: No long-term commitment is required. The subscription runs according to the selected billing interval and renews automatically unless canceled.

legal.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Risk & Legal
legal.subtitle: Important information about trading risks, limitations, and regulatory considerations.

legal.items.title: What risks are involved?
legal.items.description: Trading always carries risk. Our strategy focuses on risk management but cannot eliminate losses.

legal.items.title: Is this financial advice?
legal.items.description: No. Our platform provides tools and strategies, but you make all trading decisions independently.

legal.items.title: Who should not use this system?
legal.items.description: This system may not be suitable for those with low risk tolerance or without sufficient understanding of trading.

support.title: üõü Support
support.subtitle: Dedicated assistance and resources to help you at every stage.

support.items.title: What kind of support is provided?
support.items.description: Our support team is available 24/7 via chat and email to assist you whenever needed.

support.items.title: How can I contact support?
support.items.description: You can reach us directly through your account dashboard or by emailing support@example.com.

support.items.title: What is the response time?
support.items.description: Most inquiries are answered within a few hours; urgent issues are prioritized immediately.
